resume.skillmessage: Here you can create a short write-up of your skills to show off to employers

education.description: Graduated cum laude. Alongside my major in computer science, I also completed a minor in Japanese and every core class the biology major requires.
education.extracirriculars: Treasurer and Co-founder of the Computer Science Society, Arboretum Trail Crew, Lion Dance & Taiko Performer.

education.description: The Biological Sciences Magnet, colloquially known as the Zoo Magnet, is a unit of North Hollywood High located at the Los Angeles Zoo. Courses were heavily STEM focused and were frequently conducted at the Los Angleles Zoo.

work.title: Software Developmer Intern
work.description:
I  was invited by my Computer Science professor to participate in a research project where we developed a highly scaleable, parallel compression algorithm for Omic Big Data. We were able to achieve time complexity improvements upwards of 900%.

Responsibilities Included:
tasks: Reviewed, notated and refractored code throughout the entire project
Researched and determined optimal technologies
Added accessibility functions
Presented research at West Michigan Regional Undergraduate Science Research Conference

work.title: Intake Specialist
work.description:
Served as point of contact for the Great Plates Delivered via phone. This program provided frozen food delivered to eligible clients' homes as a form of COVID relief.

Responsibilities Included:
tasks: Spearheaded Google Speaker Program Enrollment. (Technological assistance for the senior population)
Enrolled new participants in the Great Plates Delivered program
Served as point of contact for existing clients to resolve issues.
Create and update client information within database.

work.title: Help Desk Specialist
work.description: Provided  IT support to Faculty and Student body on a variety of support issues including:
tasks: Monitoring end-user requests for assistance and providing appropriate support
Creating, changing, and deleting user accounts
Performing AV audits, ensuring equipment in facilities were fully functional
Deploying new or upgrading existing hardware & software for end-users
Responding to on-call requests
Providing IT support for PCs, printers, peripherals, telephone systems, and cellular devices
Supporting system security through OS and application patching, anti-virus support

work.title: Zookeeper
work.description:
While attending Zoo Magnet High School, I participated in the Animal Husbandry Internship. I assisted the zookeepers with daily activities at the Los Angeles Zoo.

Specific responsibilities included:
tasks: Overseeing hoof stock such as okapi, kudzu, bongos, as well as lions and ostriches, porcupines and more
Maintaining enclosures
Preparing meals
Maintaining detailed heath records
Ensuring their safety.
Educating guests

work.title: Business Manager
work.description:
Researched, planned, and created a campus store for the North Hollywood Zoo Magnet School.

As Business Manager, my responsibilities included oversight of all:
tasks: Sales
Inventory
Staffing
Finance
Suppliers
Adhering to LAUSD food regulation requirements.

testimonials.text: Here you should write some nice things that someone has said about you. No lies though, employers can tell when you are lying.

That Tim Baker must be one of the most brilliant developers I've ever met! It is amazing that nobody has hired him yet. Hey you, you should hire this guy, he may be fresh out of University and have zero on the job experience but I am confident that he will be one of your best developers in no time!
